attributes.action: Give Dabirul Choudhury recognition for his staggering effort in fundraising.
attributes.additional_details:
Dabirul Islam Choudhury has raised a staggering £75 thousand so far for over twenty different charities which help people affected by coronavirus in the UK and Bangladesh, and those delivering aid to refugees in Syria, Yemen, and Palestine.

Dabrirul's fantastic efforts in raising money during Ramadam have gone unnoticed due to lack of media and MSM coverage and its time he was thanked for his kind selfless actions.
attributes.background: We the British public want 100-year-old old Dabriul to be given recognition for his selfless act to humanity when he walked 100-laps of his garden while fasting during Ramadan to raise money for those affected by coronavirus.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
